content: Provide a list of 13 words that have 'ara' somewhere in them.

Sure! Here are 13 words that contain "ara" somewhere in them:

1. Carafe
2. Araucaria
3. Paramedic
4. Arabesque
5. Marionette
6. Barrier
7. Paradigm
8. Cara Cara
9. Arachnid
10. Varanus
11. Antarctic
12. Parable
13. Armistice

I hope this helps!
